p: The usefulness of the extracted liquid (hot extraction) and volatile (hydrodistillation) compounds in different biological activities were also assessed. 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) radical scavenging method was used to determine their antioxidant potential. The antibacterial and antifungal capacities were evaluated by the microdilution method, against seven pathogenic microorganisms. Additionally, the study of the allelopathic effect of extracts against Lens culinaris Medik (lens) and Brassica oleracea L. (Kohlrabi) seeds, as a potential green eco-friendly biofertilizer or bioherbicide, was carried out.
